Config.Documentation: // The Hadoop job configuration of the cluster step.

Id.Documentation: // The identifier of the cluster step.

Name.Documentation: // The name of the cluster step.

Status.Documentation: // The current execution status details of the cluster step.

StepTimeline.Documentation: // The timeline of the cluster step lifecycle.

CreationDateTime.Documentation: // The date and time when the cluster step was created.

EndDateTime.Documentation: // The date and time when the cluster step execution completed or failed.

StartDateTime.Documentation: // The date and time when the cluster step execution started.

Name.Documentation: // The name of the product configuration.

Key.Documentation:
// A user-defined key, which is the minimum required information for a valid
// tag. For more information, see Tagging Amazon EMR Resources (http://docs.aws.amazon.com/ElasticMapReduce/latest/DeveloperGuide/emr-plan-tags.html).

Value.Documentation:
// A user-defined value, which is optional in a tag. For more information, see
// Tagging Amazon EMR Resources (http://docs.aws.amazon.com/ElasticMapReduce/latest/DeveloperGuide/emr-plan-tags.html).

JobFlowIds.Documentation: // A list of job flows to be shutdown.

Ref.Documentation: // A list of job flows to be shutdown.

VolumeSpecification.Documentation:
// EBS volume specifications such as volume type, IOPS, and size(GiB) that will
// be requested for the EBS volume attached to an EC2 instance in the cluster.

Iops.Documentation: // The number of I/O operations per second (IOPS) that the volume supports.

SizeInGB.Documentation:
// The volume size, in gibibytes (GiB). This can be a number from 1 – 1024.
// If the volume type is EBS-optimized, the minimum value is 10.

VolumeType.Documentation: // The volume type. Volume types supported are gp2, io1, standard.

Ref.Documentation:
// The volume size, in gibibytes (GiB). This can be a number from 1 – 1024.
// If the volume type is EBS-optimized, the minimum value is 10.
// The volume type. Volume types supported are gp2, io1, standard.

Operation.Name: DescribeCluster
Operation.Documentation:
// Provides cluster-level details including status, hardware and software configuration,
// VPC settings, and so on. For information about the cluster steps, see ListSteps.

Operation.Name: DescribeStep
Operation.Documentation: // Provides more detail about the cluster step.
